title: Brighten Up: Ayurvedic Enzyme Peels for Healthy Skin
author: Harish
excerpt: Enzyme peels offer brightening without abrasion. Learn how papaya, turmeric, and yogurt combine to create a gentle Ayurvedic exfoliation ritual.
content:
Why Enzyme Peels?

Unlike physical scrubs, enzyme peels dissolve dead skin cells through proteolytic enzymes—making them ideal for sensitive or Pitta-prone skin.

The Ayurvedic Twist

  • Papaya: Natural enzymatic exfoliation.
  • Turmeric: Brightening and balancing.
  • Yogurt: Cooling and hydrating.

How to Use

Apply a thin layer for 5–10 minutes, rinse gently, and follow with a light moisturizer. Use once every two weeks.

Precautions

Avoid using after strong sun exposure or on irritated skin. Patch-test first.
